title: NICE.BIT
author: NICE.BIT
content: some one like to invest ?? need 50 k btc is ok !! need that for a pleasure xxx mini xxx legal nice one xxxTHANKS .... invest time 1 year return max 1000% regs and love

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: NICE.BIT on March 08, 2023, 01:53:46 PMsome one like to invest ?? need 50 k btc is ok !! need that for a pleasure xxx mini xxx legal nice one xxxTHANKS .... invest time 1 year return max 1000% regs and love Stop with this nonsense - no one will give you $50 000 no matter what you promise, especially when you offer even 1000% profit after one year. If you have a worthwhile project, go to a bank and ask for a loan, or ask mom and dad to lend you money

comments.author: NICE.BIT
comments.body: heee our teacher managemnet is max 100% yes but asking a law boy and its up to our plans to deal like we like to do it .....yes but right its nutshit ....but may u know contracts ....notes and ll that .....its MAX 1000% MAX 1000% MAX !!!

comments.author: speedy963
comments.body: I didn't even fully get what you mean OP. What I understood based on your post is that you're only asking for money promising 10x the return which is clearly and investment fraud.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: My man is smoking some green crack, pass me some of it please.

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.body: Oh wow! Where do I send the funds to?

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: NICE.BIT on March 08, 2023, 04:21:39 PMheee our teacher managemnet is max 100% yes but asking a law boy and its up to our plans to deal like we like to do it .....yes but right its nutshit ....but may u know contracts ....notes and ll that .....its MAX 1000% MAX 1000% MAX !!!Seems legit where do I send the funds to?  I'm not into that escrow stuff either I want to sink my irreversible transaction right into your hands.  If at all possible though I would like my investment returns calculated back to me in bitconnect.  I have a grand plan and sending you 50 g's sounds like a good start.
